data.eml:eml: The genus Neotherina Dognin (Geometridae, Ennominae) in Costa Rica

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sullivan, J. Bolling, Chacon, Isidro (2011): The genus Neotherina Dognin (Geometridae, Ennominae) in Costa Rica. ZooKeys 149: 39-49, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.149.2346, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.149.2346
